TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventBindingService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService
Public MustInherit Class EventBindingService Implements IEventBindingService

summary.span: 介面的預設實作。

span.span: A default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由提供服務，以登錄為元件事件的事件處理常式可用來連結事件處理常式與元件的事件，從設計工具的程式碼。By providing a service for registering event handlers for component events, provides a way to link an event handler with a component event from designer code.

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的名稱方法必須與所使用的指令碼語言相容，而且它必須不會與您的程式碼中的任何其他名稱發生衝突。The name returned by the method must be compatible with the script language being used and it must not conflict with any other name in your code.

summary.span: 提供通知，告知特定的方法不再由事件處理常式使用。

span.span: Provides a notification that a particular method is no longer being used by an event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些實作可能會想要移除事件處理常式，當任何事件不使用它。Some implementations may intend to remove the event handler when no events are using it. 藉由覆寫和，實作可以推斷出不再需要的方法時。By overriding and , an implementation can infer when a method is no longer needed.

summary.span: 傳回相容方法的名稱集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of names of compatible methods.

returns.span: 相容方法之名稱的字串集合。

span.span: A collection of strings that are names of compatible methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回集合中每個字串是方法的簽章與委派中包含相容的方法名稱`e`。Each string returned in the collection is the method name of a method whose signature is compatible with the delegate contained in `e`. 如果沒有名稱為相容，則應傳回空集合。 should return an empty collection if no names are compatible.

span.span: The method name to validate.

summary.span: 驗證提供的方法名稱是否對正在使用的語言或指令碼有效。

span.span: Validates that the provided method name is valid for the language or script being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作不做任何動作。The default implementation does nothing. 您可能會覆寫此設定，並擲回例外狀況，如果您使用的名稱無效。You may override this and throw an exception if the name is invalid for your use.
